name: html-to-pdf
title: HTML to PDF Converter
description: Convert HTML files to high-quality PDF documents
content:
Overview

This application converts HTML files into high-quality PDF documents. Built using WeasyPrint, it preserves all styling, layouts, and formatting from the original HTML.

Features

  • Convert any HTML file to PDF format
  • Preserves CSS styling and layouts
  • Supports modern HTML5 and CSS3 features
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your HTML file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the PDF output

Output

The application generates a PDF file with the same base name as your input file (e.g., page.html becomes page.pdf). The PDF maintains all formatting, colors, and layouts from the original HTML.

Use Cases

  • Creating printable versions of web pages
  • Generating PDF reports from HTML templates
  • Archiving web content in PDF format
  • Converting styled documentation to PDF
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/html_to_pdf.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
